Unit testing concurrent code is very hard. You can't rely on unit test
to impose every concurrent errors. Here unit test only can offer some
"comfort". However, you can read Brian Goetz's new book "Java
concurrency in practice" (Chapter 12 "Testing councurrent programs")
for more advices.
